name: Akiya
description:
Follow the fate of this Japanese house through interactive scenes centred on the experience of Kuro the cat.

This game was made to be played with a Xbox or a PS4 Controller.

Akiya is a Student Project from the Cnam-Enjmin, the French School of Digital and Interactive Games and Media.

Team Members:

Lucas Belarouci - Management Counseling
Laurène Bonnet - Illustrations (Credits)
Alexandre Charvin - Game Design, Project Management
Valentin di Domenico - Music Composer
Simon Gigant - Gameplay Programming, Music Composer
Julen Laborde - Game Art, Level Art
Magali Lefort - Game Art , Level Art
Guilhem Pech - Tool Programming
Terry Perez-Gervais - Sound Design
